name: Sizzlipede

evolution.description: Sizzlipede can evolve into Centiskorch at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 13 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Radiator Pokémon. It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking them in its coils. Once they're well-done, it will voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.

abilities.name: Flash Fire
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from fire or fire-type attacks. Instead, immediately after taking a hit from a fire-type move, or in open flames, double the STAB bonus on the next fire-type move.

abilities.name: White Smoke
abilities.description: Other Pokémon's moves or abilities cannot lower this Pokémon stats.

abilities.name: Flame Body
abilities.description: The flames from this Pokémon's body shine dim light in a 15 ft radius. In addition, when hit by a melee attack, roll a d10. On a 10, the attacker is burned.
